param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class suffix
param.description: Suffix to be applied to the modultable class

param.name: tmpl_suffix
param.label: Advanced search template suffix
param.description: Suffix to be applied to the default search template mod_jreviews_advsearch.html.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Category Select List Settings
param.description: These settings affect the category select list if present in the form.

param.name: cat_auto
param.label: Category Auto-detect
param.description: Enabling this setting overrides all ID filters below. If you have a large number of sections and categories it is recommended you use this setting. In pages where a category or section cannot be detected only the sections will be shown on the list filtered by IDs used below.

param.name: dir_id
param.label: Directory ID (optional, comma list)
param.description: Limits options show in category list.

param.name: criteria_id
param.label: Listing Type ID (optional, comma list)
param.description: Limits options show in category list.

param.name: section_id
param.label: Section Id (optional, comma list)
param.description: Limits options show in category list.

param.name: cat_id
param.label: Category ID (optional, comma list)
param.description: Limits options show in category list.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Category Select List Settings
param.description: These settings affect the category select list if present in the form.

param.name: cat_order_alpha
param.label: Category Order
param.description: Determines the ordering of the categories in the list.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
